name: DeeDawg's NRaas Tuning Generator
short_description:
A tool that'll provide you with a nice and easy GUI, which you can use to generate tuning files for all tunable Sims 3 mods by NRaas Industries.

This tool is no longer under development in it's current state. Will be part of my soon to be released tools collection, and it'll be hosted at Github instead.
summary: A tool you can use to generate tuning files.
